resources.string:
Ron \"Ziroby\" Romero is a Senior Software Developer / Architect specializing in Agile development.
  • Expert and advocate for Agile software development.

  • Architect, Team Lead, formal trainer, and always a leader, an informal trainer, and a mentor.

  • Fifteen years development experience in Java, C#, C++, Android, SQL, etc.

  • Available for development work and Agile consulting, especially in the Austin, Texas area.
